descriptionHtml:
Rolf is a nordic mage with 38 level , I joined only to Mage Academy in Winterhold , I made almost all quests there... Anyways You can join to Stormcloaks or other guilds and You will have many things to do in game.
HeÂ´s wearing Psijic robe with monk hood and Morokei diadem who gives 100% mana regen.
There You have links:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7828 - Archmage Robe changed to Psijic with Monk Hood by TheSilentBlade

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2092 - Archmage Crafting by kab

I hope You will enjoy the game with that character.
Sorry for my english :)
author: zizi17
